channel.title: Toxic-Pkz 317 - You Choose Your Journey
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/77384122/tewtrgvysb.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Updated Source![/size]
[url=http://toxic-pkz.com]toxic-pkz.com[/url]
[size=14pt]- #1 Owner on everyday - Best staff, friendly and helpful - Vote4Cash system - Brand new player base just starting out - Countless nostalgic hours of gameplay - PK Shops - Great and helpful staff (taking mod apps atm on the forums) - VPS hosted 24/7 DDos free - 5+ of the original Minigames - Donator privileges - Amazing combat - Hyperion game engine, and event and task system - 99 percent of all bugs fixed - Original Skills all working to the fullest extent - Flawless switching - Great economy for a fresh start - All correct item models with ints - Fast Cache, 16mb - ::pure though xp rates are a bit hard so you still have to train to max - Point Shop, get points from slayer, bossing and pvp - 317 Godwars - King Black Dragon - Dag Kings - 5+ PvP Options High level, Multi, Edge PvP, etc - Domain - All Skills 100% - Coloured Whips and Other Customs! (not too many though) - 99% Special Moves[/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VHhdye6.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/w3313.png[/img]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2mochgg.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/qoan81.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/m9blhc.png[/img]
Thanks For Reading - Zoar[/center]

item.title: Toxic-Pkz 317 - You Choose Your Journey
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Hyperion game engine

In a PI? No thanks…

I’m sorry but the server is just out of the “current stage” of game play. This isn’t 2011. But good luck.
